short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can block websites you don't want to access.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take control of your online experience with Website blocker, the ultimate website blocker extension for Google Chrome. Unleash the power to shape your internet usage by blocking specific sections of websites, to help you stay focused and productive.

Key Features:

1. Precision Blocking:
Customize your online environment by blocking specific sections of websites like never before. Whether it's distracting content or time-consuming features, take charge of your digital space.

How to Use:

1. Install Site blocker from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Navigate to the website you want to customize.
3. Use the extension to block specific sections and take control of your online experience.
